parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The name of the deal.

parameter.name: summary
parameter.description: A description of the deal.

parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: The owner id of the deal.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: A simple red-yellow-green status for the deal. 1 = red, 2 = yellow, 3 = green.

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: Custom fields for the deal. .

parameter.name: createdAt
parameter.description: Timestamp for when deal was created.

parameter.name: updatedAt
parameter.description: Timestamp for when deal was last updated.

parameter.name: expectedCloseDate
parameter.description: The expected close date.

parameter.name: closedTime
parameter.description: The date when the deal was closed (either won or lost).

parameter.name: isArchived
parameter.description: Flag for archived status.

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: The deal's value, possibly with decimal value (depends on the currency of the account).

parameter.name: valueInCents
parameter.description: The deal's value, in cents. DEPRECATED: Please use value instead.

parameter.name: primaryContactId
parameter.description: The id of the primary contact for the deal.

parameter.name: personIds
parameter.description: A convenient list of collaborators that includes basic attributes for each.

parameter.name: sharedUserIds
parameter.description: The array of user ids with whom the deal's been shared.

parameter.name: companyId
parameter.description: The id of the company associated with the deal.

parameter.name: companyName
parameter.description: The company name of the deal (if changed, will find or create a company by that name).

parameter.name: probability
parameter.description: The probability, from 0-100, that the deal will close.

parameter.name: dealStageId
parameter.description: The id of the deal stage.

parameter.name: sourceId
parameter.description: The source id of the deal.

parameter.name: todoTemplateId
parameter.description: To apply a deal-based todo template when creating the deal.

parameter.name: todoTemplateUserId
parameter.description: To set the owner of any tasks created by applying the given todo template.
